p: We embedded a study team member in the partner organizations. She monitored how many climate activism events were attended by each participant. The events were held on Zoom during this period due to the COVID-19 pandemic. She did so by comparing all sign-in names on Zoom calls with the names of the participants of our study, and if any match was found, one ‘event score’ was added for each participant attending. This was repeated at every event so that for all participants of our experiment, there was a record showing which events they attended. Participants also self-reported their environmental education and leadership behaviours and their emissions reduction behaviours.
